text: Hoffa is a 1992 French-American biographical crime drama movie directed by Danny DeVito, written by David Mamet and starring Jack Nicholson as Jimmy Hoffa. It received mixed reviews. ==Cast== == Other websites == * Category:1990s biographical movies Category:1992 crime drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:French biographical movies Category:French crime movies Category:French drama movies Category:Movies set in the 1970s Category:Trucker movies Category:Movies directed by Danny DeVito
title: Hoffa
